variable.name: Consent
variable.value: Subjects did not participate in the study, did not complete a consent document and are included only for the pedigree structure and/or genotype controls, such as HapMap subjects
Diabetes, Kidney Disease, Retinopathy and/or Related Diseases (DNAR)

variable.name: AffectionStatus
variable.description: Case/Control status of the subject [Case, Control, ControlLooseCriteria, CaseLooseCriteria, NA]
